actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Bertha Berg, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to compensate a named individual for any physical, psychological, and economic injuries sustained as a result of being involuntarily detained at the Sand Island Detention Camp and the Honouliuli Internment Camp between 1941 and 1943 and subjected to conditions of parole between 1943 and 1944.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Bertha Berg, and for other purposes.
